name: DxTag – SEO-Boosting WooCommerce Listing Generator
author: Guaven Labs

sections.description:
Transform your WooCommerce website with DxTag, an intelligent, dynamic listing and taxonomy plugin designed to boost your SEO visibility. This innovative tool goes beyond traditional display methods by creating custom collections and listings based on parameters you set. Whether you want to showcase products based on price, stock quantity, categories, or any other meta+taxonomy rules, DxTag has got you covered.

But DxTag does more than just organize your products – it turbocharges your SEO efforts by generating dynamic taxonomy terms, enabling your website to rank better in search engine results. Experience how easy it is to create and manage dynamic collections that not only enhance user experience but also amplify your site’s discoverability.

Get started with DxTag today and unlock the true potential of your WooCommerce website.
sections.installation:
1. Upload guaven_dxtag.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or Use Wp-Admin->Plugins->Add New and upload guaven_dxtag.zip
  2. Activate the plugin using the ‘Plugins’ menu in your WordPress website.
  3. Navigate to Settings->DxTag Rules to get started.
sections.faq:
Does the plugin create duplicate product data?

No, it doesn’t. It just created hidden taxonomy terms to list your existing post objects under the set rules by you.

What is the difference between taxonomies created manually and taxonomies generated by this plugin?

Technically, they are both the same. The plugin uses native WP Taxonomy Terms. The main difference is
products here are assigned to DxTags automatcailly while in default tags post-taxonomy relations are created manually.

Is the plugin freemium?

Currently it is absolutely free and doesn’t have a PRO version.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4: Updated Readme and WP compatibility
1.0.2-3: Minor improvements for WooCommerce related pages.
1.0.1: Minor improvements.
